meanings.sent1: The brave knight was exterminating the evil dragon to protect the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The pest control company was exterminating the ants in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The little boy pretended to be a superhero exterminating all the imaginary monsters in his room.
meanings.sent4: The powerful storm was exterminating everything in its path with fierce winds and rain.
meanings.sent5: The wildfire was exterminating the forest, leaving only ashes behind.

meanings.sent1: The determined gardener was exterminating the stubborn weeds from the flower bed.
meanings.sent2: The detective was exterminating all evidence that could lead to the culprit.
meanings.sent3: The magician waved his wand, exterminating the colorful scarves into thin air.
meanings.sent4: The charity event was exterminating hunger in the community with generous donations.
meanings.sent5: The antivirus software was exterminating the computer virus, restoring the system to normal.

meanings.sent1: The deadly virus was exterminating the population of the small town.
meanings.sent2: The farmer was exterminating the pests that were destroying his crops.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about a superhero exterminating all the bad jokes in the world.
meanings.sent4: The ancient curse was exterminating the royal bloodline one by one.
meanings.sent5: The evil sorcerer was exterminating the hope of the villagers with his dark magic.
